text: was a ryuka poet. Onna Nabe was born in Onna, Okinawa, and lived in the 18th century.Yaka[1995:28-36] ==Footnotes== ==References== *Kei Higa Okinawa Encyclopedia 1983, Okinawa Times, Naha, jou, chu, ge. *Munekatsu Yaka Ryukyu Bungaku, Folklore studies on Ryuka 1995 Kindai Bungeisha, Tokyo. **屋嘉宗克 琉球文学 琉歌の民俗学的研究 1995 近代文芸社 東京 *Nihon Shodō Bijutukan, Ryuka, the heart of songs of the Southern Island, 1992, Nihonshodou Shuppankyoukai, Tokyo. **日本書道美術館 琉歌ー南島のうたの心、1992, 日本書道出版協会、東京 ==Other websites== * Ryuka Category:18th-century Ryukyuan people Category:Asian poets
title: Onna Nabe
